title: 'Our Thing' Season 2 Episode 6 - It Was Never The Same
description:
The critically acclaimed podcast returns for a second season. Directed by: James Carroll.

In this episode Sammy tells the story of a hit he wasn't responsible for, but he regrets even knowing about it.

Join The Gravano Family on Patreon: http://patreon.com/sammythebull?fan_landing=true

Sammy "The Bull" Merchandise: http://www.sammythebull.com/shop

Follow Sammy on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/salvatore.gravano.thebull

Follow Sammy on Instagram: http://instagram.com/officialsammythebull
